General.Name: EGing Photovoltaic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: EGing Photovoltaic Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells photovoltaic products in China and internationally. Its products include silicon wafers, crystalline silicon photovoltaic cells and modules, and photovoltaic panel battery modules. The company also engages in the photovoltaic power generation business. In addition, it offers residential, commercial, and utility-scale solutions. The company was formerly known as Haitong Food Group Co., Ltd. EGing Photovoltaic Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.
